Anime.title: hunter x hunter (2011)
Anime.description: A Young boy named gon goes on an adventure to find his father.

Anime.title: Death Note
Anime.description: A teen genius stumbles across a mysterious otherworldly notebook: the Death Note, and grants the user the supernatural ability to kill anyone whose name is written in its pages.

Anime.title: One Punch Man
Anime.description: Saitama, a superhero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch but seeks to find a worthy opponent after growing bored by a lack of challenge due to his overwhelming strength.

Anime.title: One Piece
Anime.description: The story follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy, a boy whose body gained the properties of rubber after unintentionally eating a Devil Fruit.

Anime.title: Naruto
Anime.description: It tells the story of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

Anime.title: Attack on Titan
Anime.description: Attack on Titan centers on a civilization inside three walls, the last location where humans still live. Over one hundred years ago, humanity was driven to the brink of extinction after the emergence of humanoid giants called Titans, who attack and eat humans on sight.

Anime.title: Black Clover
Anime.description: Black Clover follows the first adventures of Asta and the Black Bulls in the fictional Clover Kingdom. After Asta receives a grimoire and joins the Black Bulls to become the new Wizard King, he explores a dungeon and meets Mars, a magic knight from the Diamond Kingdom.

Anime.title: Tokyo Goul
Anime.description: A Tokyo college student is attacked by a ghoul, a superpowered human who feeds on human flesh.

Anime.title: The Promised Neverland
Anime.description: The Promised Neverland follows three protagonists, Emma, Norman, and Ray, along with a cast of orphans who live together. Their lives have been full of joy, that is until the protagonists learn the orphanage is really a farm where children are raised and given to demons to be eaten.

Anime.title: Monster
Anime.description: The story revolves around Kenzo Tenma, a Japanese surgeon living in Germany whose life enters turmoil after getting himself involved with Johan Liebert, one of his former patients, who is revealed to be a dangerous serial killer.

Anime.title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K
Anime.description: To the average person, psychic abilities might seem a blessing; for Kusuo Saiki, however, this couldn't be further from the truth. Gifted with a wide assortment of supernatural abilities ranging from telepathy to x-ray vision, he finds this so-called blessing to be nothing but a curse.

Top_Anime.title: hunter x hunter (2011)
Top_Anime.description: A Young boy named gon goes on an adventure to find his father.

Top_Anime.title: One Piece
Top_Anime.description: The story follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy, a boy whose body gained the properties of rubber after unintentionally eating a Devil Fruit.

Top_Anime.title: Naruto
Top_Anime.description: It tells the story of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

Top_Anime.title: Attack on Titan
Top_Anime.description: Attack on Titan centers on a civilization inside three walls, the last location where humans still live. Over one hundred years ago, humanity was driven to the brink of extinction after the emergence of humanoid giants called Titans, who attack and eat humans on sight.

Top_Anime.title: Demon Slayer
Top_Anime.description: A youth begins a quest to fight demons and save his sister after finding his family slaughtered and his sister turned into a demon.

Top_Anime.title: Dragon Ball Z
Top_Anime.description: Dragon Ball Z picks up five years after the end of the Dragon Ball anime, with Goku now a young adult and father to his son, Gohan.

Top_Anime.title: Haiku!
Top_Anime.description: Hinata Shouyou gained a sudden love of volleyball after watching a national championship match on TV. His volleyball team definitely needs their skills, but only if they can stop bickering and learn to work together as teammates.

Top_Anime.title: Death Note
Top_Anime.description: A teen genius stumbles across a mysterious otherworldly notebook: the Death Note, and grants the user the supernatural ability to kill anyone whose name is written in its pages.

Top_Anime.title: Tokyo Goul
Top_Anime.description: A Tokyo college student is attacked by a ghoul, a superpowered human who feeds on human flesh.

Top_Anime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood
Top_Anime.description: The series follows the story of two alchemist brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, who want to restore their bodies after a disastrous failed attempt to bring their mother back to life through alchemy.

Top_Anime.title: Steins Gate
Top_Anime.description: Steins; Gate is a story about time travel and the consequences of it's misuse. The protagonist is a man named Okabe Rintarou; a self-proclaimed 'mad scientist' who goes by the name of Hououin Kyouma.

Top_Anime.title: Code Geass
Top_Anime.description: The Holy Empire of Britannia conquered the country known as Japan and now call it Area 11. Its residents lost their rights to self-govern and are now called Elevens.

Top_Anime.title: Naruto Shippuden
Top_Anime.description: More than two years have passed since the most recent adventures in the Hidden Leaf Village, ample time for ninja wannabe Naruto Uzumaki to have developed skills worthy of recognition and respect.

Adventure_Anime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood
Adventure_Anime.description: The series follows the story of two alchemist brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, who want to restore their bodies after a disastrous failed attempt to bring their mother back to life through alchemy.

Adventure_Anime.title: Fairy Tail
Adventure_Anime.description: The story follows the adventures of Natsu Dragneel, a member of the popular wizard guild Fairy Tail, as he searches the fictional world of Earth-land for the dragon Igneel.

Adventure_Anime.title: Cowboy Bepop
Adventure_Anime.description: A ragtag crew of bounty hunters on the run from their pasts as they hunt down the solar systemâ€™s most dangerous criminals.

Adventure_Anime.title: Sword Art Online
Adventure_Anime.description: The series takes place in the near future and focuses on protagonist Kazuto 'Kirito' Kirigaya and Asuna Yuuki as they play through various virtual reality MMORPG worlds.

Adventure_Anime.title: Seven Deadly Sins
Adventure_Anime.description: A princess finds a former knight at a pub and joins a quest to reunite his group of cavaliers in order to overthrow tyrants.

Adventure_Anime.title: Akame Ga Kill
Adventure_Anime.description: The story focuses on Tatsumi, a young villager who travels to the Capital to raise money for his home only to discover strong corruption in the area.
